title: Michelle, Obama girls travel Europe
text: Michelle, Malia and Sasha Obama in Europe Updated 2020 GMT (0320 HKT) June 17, 2015 Michelle, Malia and Sasha Obama in Europe 11 photos First lady Michelle Obama arrives in London with her daughters -- Sasha, right, and Malia -- and her mother, Marian Robinson, on Monday, June 15. The first lady is in Europe as part of a global tour promoting her Let Girls Learn Initiative. Hide Caption Michelle, Malia and Sasha Obama in Europe 11 photos Michelle Obama meets Prince Harry at Kensington Palace in London on Tuesday, June 16. Hide Caption 2 of 11 Michelle, Malia and Sasha Obama in Europe 11 photos Obama speaks during a Let Girls Learn initiative meeting June 16 at the Mulberry School for Girls in London. Hide Caption 3 of 11 Michelle, Malia and Sasha Obama in Europe 11 photos Obama sits between the UK Department of International Development's Justine Greening, left, and Peace Corps volunteer Bina Contreras at the Mulberry School for Girls on June 16. Hide Caption 4 of 11 Michelle, Malia and Sasha Obama in Europe 11 photos Obama meets Prime Minister David Cameron and his wife, Samantha Cameron, at 10 Downing Street in London on June 16. Hide Caption 5 of 11 Michelle, Malia and Sasha Obama in Europe 11 photos Sasha Obama, left, and Malia Obama, center, leave Downing Street after a meeting with the Prime Minister and his wife on June 16. Hide Caption Michelle, Malia and Sasha Obama in Europe 11 photos Michelle Obama and her daughters arrive in Milan, Italy, on Wednesday, June 17. Hide Caption Michelle, Malia and Sasha Obama in Europe 11 photos The Obamas shake hands at Milan's Malpensa Airport on June 17. Hide Caption Michelle, Malia and Sasha Obama in Europe 11 photos Michelle Obama cooks with children from the American School of Milan on June 17. Hide Caption Michelle, Malia and Sasha Obama in Europe 11 photos Obama hosted a cooking demonstration for students in Milan on June 17. Hide Caption 10 of 11 Michelle, Malia and Sasha Obama in Europe 11 photos Michelle Obama meets Italian Prime Minister Matteo Renzi and his wife, Agnese Landini, in Milan on June 17. Hide Caption 11 of 11 First lady Michelle Obama is visiting Europe with her daughters and her mother for a global tour promoting her Let Girls Learn Initiative. More from Politics
